thread.title_full: Yes, That's Paulina Rubio Looking Like the Rock Star She Is at the Grammys

author: Alessandra Foresto
title: Yes, That's Paulina Rubio Looking Like the Rock Star She Is at the Grammys
text:
Paulina Rubio at the 2017 Grammys Yes, That's Paulina Rubio Looking Like the Rock Star She Is at the Grammys February 12, 2017 Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 Yes, That's Paulina Rubio Looking Like the Rock Star She Is at the Grammys 
Mexican pop star and former X Factor judge Paulina Rubio showed up at the 2017 Grammys wearing the perfect dress for the award show and her personality. As she posed on the red carpet, flashing a rock-on sign, Paulina gave us a peek at her see-through sequined dress featuring a high neckline and side slits that allowed for a clear view of her leather studded booties. Her dress gave us serious Chrissy Teigen vibes , and her pink eye makeup was so trendy, Lea Michele was also wearing it . Keep reading to see more photos of Paulina at music's biggest night.
